Package index

All functions

has_label()
A selector function to use in tidyverse functions
labels()
Get the list of labels in a datatagr
labels_df()
Extract a data.frame of all labelled variables
lost_labels_action() get_lost_labels_action()
Check and set behaviour for lost labels
make_datatagr()
Create a datatagr from a data.frame
`names<-`(<datatagr>)
Rename columns of a datatagr
print(<datatagr>)
Printing method for datatagr objects
set_labels()
Change labels of a datatagr object
`[`(<datatagr>) `[<-`(<datatagr>) `[[<-`(<datatagr>) `$<-`(<datatagr>)
Subsetting of datatagr objects
type()
Type Selection Helper
validate_datatagr()
Checks the content of a datatagr object
validate_labels()
Checks the labels of a datatagr object
validate_types()
Type check variables
vars_labels()
Internal printing function for variables and labels
